description.value:
A wall of flames erupts out of the ground in a ring around you with a radius of 15 feet and a height of 10 feet. Creatures who start their turn in the ring of fire or pass through it on their turn take [[/r 1d6]] fire damage. Creatures within the ring of fire who willingly try to move through the fire to escape must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw to do so. Creatures who are immune to fear or fire automatically succeed on this saving throw.

Overcharge Tech. When you cast this power using a tech slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage of the ring of fire increases by [[/r 1d6]] for each slot level above 1st.
